text: We have several articles about healthcare and CX in the pipeline. Anyone recommend any subject matter experts in this space? We'd like their voices to be included in the articles. Ideally, they can talk about the role of data, analytics, optimization, design in relationship to patient experience. Or, they may know a thing or two about HIPAA when it comes to creating better digital experiences for users. Any referrals or leads are appreciated! Thanks!

elements.text: We have several articles about healthcare and CX in the pipeline. Anyone recommend any subject matter experts in this space? We'd like their voices to be included in the articles. Ideally, they can talk about the role of data, analytics, optimization, design in relationship to patient experience. Or, they may know a thing or two about HIPAA when it comes to creating better digital experiences for users. Any referrals or leads are appreciated! Thanks!

text:
One of my clients (<https://primehealthdenver.com/|PrimeHealth> in Denver, CO) had been working on a digital patient experience for their functional medicine clinic right before COVID hit in earnest. They ended up growing like WILDFIRE last year when clinics in their area were laying off employees left and right, and it was mostly due to their CX, especially doing virtual healthcare with patients all over the US.

Their co-founder/practice manager, Luke, is a huge data nerd and I think he'd love to share what they learned in the process and how data/analytics shaped their success. Let me know if you'd like me to connect the two of you!

attachments.title: PrimeHealth Denver - Integrative and Functional Medicine
attachments.text: PrimeHealth is an Integrative and Functional Medicine practice that uses advanced diagnostic testing to provide exceptional care.
attachments.fallback: PrimeHealth Denver: PrimeHealth Denver - Integrative and Functional Medicine
